definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
ardent/intense/fierce/stern/upright/to give one's life for a noble cause/exploits/achievements

sentences.english: Flamingos feeding lakes can be found throughout Africa.

sentences.english: Flamingo might sound, is in the makeup cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 初聽火烈鳥，是在化妝櫃中。

sentences.english: I wanted to make a flamingo, but I could not do it very well .
sentences.chinese: 我想做一個火烈鳥，卻做成了一個“四不像”。

sentences.english: The flamingos and baboons here at Lake Bogoria live in harmony.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，火烈鳥和狒狒在博戈尼亞湖和諧相處。

sentences.english: Now, the island is one of only a handful of Lesser Flamingo breeding colonies in the world.
sentences.chinese: 目前該島是世界上爲數不多的小火烈鳥繁殖基地之一。

sentences.english: In my family , I am a flamingo in the flock of pigeons.
sentences.chinese: 在家裏，我就像一隻被困在鴿籠裏的火烈鳥。

sentences.english: The Zoo has a flock of 64 flamingos.
One of the strangest sights in nature is the courtship dance of the lesser flamingo.
sentences.chinese: 火烈鳥的求偶舞是大自然最奇怪的景象之一。

sentences.english: Now there are at least 10, 000 flamingos migrating to and from the island.
sentences.chinese: 現在至少有10000只火烈鳥移民來往這座小島。

sentences.english: He’s really big, bigger than a flamingo.
sentences.chinese: 它可真大，比火烈鳥都大。

sentences.english: I am a flamingo in a flock of pigeons.
sentences.chinese: 我是被困在鴿籠裏的火烈鳥。

sentences.english: I open the book to Flamingo.
Flamingos at Graham Hall Nature Sanctuary.
sentences.chinese: 格拉翰霍爾自然保護區內的火烈鳥。

sentences.english: It is the only site in East Africa where Lesser Flamingos successfully nest.
sentences.chinese: 該湖是在東非僅有的一處小火烈鳥成功的繁殖地。
他們已經偷走了12只智利產粉紅色火烈鳥。
